thread.title: ZuZu’s reign of Spain thriving in Napa
thread.title_full: ZuZu’s reign of Spain thriving in Napa - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Michael Bauer
title: ZuZu’s reign of Spain thriving in Napa
text:
Photo: Sarah Rice, Special To The Chronicle The paella del dia with Bomba rice, chorizo, clams, sofrito and lamb and beef at Zuzu in Napa, Calif., on Thursday, October 15, 2015. The paella del dia with Bomba rice, chorizo, clams, sofrito and...
As we sat at one of the small wooden tables at ZuZu in Napa, trying to decide whether to order a Spanish wine or to stick with something local, we overheard a couple across the room discussing Pliny the Elder. The paella del dia with Bomba rice, chorizo, clams, sofrito and lamb and beef at Zuzu in Napa, Calif., on Thursday, October 15, 2015. The paella del dia with Bomba rice, chorizo, clams, sofrito and...
As we sat at one of the small wooden tables at ZuZu in Napa, trying to decide whether to order a Spanish wine or to stick with something local, we overheard a couple across the room discussing Pliny the Elder.
